mapper.sql: id, name, area_code, sex, age, profession_code, representative_works, resume, lifetime, job,create_time,update_time,head_url
mapper.select: select t.id as id,t.name as name,p.profession_name as professionName,a.area_name as area, t.sex as sex,t.age as age,t.representative_works as representativeWorks,t.resume as resume,t.lifetime as lifetime, t.job as job,t.head_url as headUrl from t_cultural_famous_ht t left join t_profession p on t.profession_code=p.profession_code left join t_area a on t.area_code=a.area_code where t.id=#{id}

select t.id as id,t.name as name,p.profession_name as professionName,a.area_name as area, t.sex as sex,t.age as age,t.representative_works as representativeWorks,t.resume as resume,t.lifetime as lifetime, t.job as job,t.head_url as headUrl from t_cultural_famous_ht t left join t_profession p on t.profession_code=p.profession_code left join t_area a on t.area_code=a.area_code where 1=1
and t.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and a.area_name like CONCAT('%',#{areaName},'%')
and t.sex =#{sex}
and t.age =#{age}
and p.profession_name like CONCAT('%',#{profession},'%')
and p.representative_works like CONCAT('%',#{representativeWorks},'%')
and p.resume like CONCAT('%',#{resume},'%')
and p.job like CONCAT('%',#{job},'%')
